text:
Transcoding an svg file into JPEG causes a pike in memory usage and leads to out of memory exceptions. Transcoding a small size image (1500 * 1500 pixels) leads to a spike of 100 MB in the heap usage. This can sometimes cause memory exception.

I have attached a code snippet to reproduce this.

Created attachment 26358
This is the svg file that I am trying to convert to JPEG.

This is the svg file that I am trying to convert to JPEG.
